name: Diceteroids
description:
Conceit

Survive rounds of asteroids. At the end of each round, choose a die. The chosen die is then rolled and a boon or curse is determined by the outcome. Choose wisely!

(Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2022)

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Click or Spacebar to shoot
Credits/Attribution
  •  Dice sprites by Kicked-in-Teeth
  • SFX Audio by Kenney.nl
  • Various sprites taken from Kenney.nl's 1-bit pack
  • Screen wrapping code lifted from this video by Sunny Valley Studio
  • Minimal4 font by Saint11
  • Vector Battle font by Freaky Fonts
  • Backgrounds generated in Dall-E Mini
  • Menu music made in BeepBox
